tr.ti: Tell the user how to deal with fetch-restricted packages

body.codesample:
pkg_nofetch() { [ -z "${SRC_URI}" ] && return
echo "!!! The following are listed in SRC_URI for ${PN}:" for MYFILE in `echo ${SRC_URI}`; do echo "!!! $MYFILE" done return }

body.p: This function is only triggered for packages which have RESTRICT="fetch" (see ) set, and only if one or more components listed in SRC_URI are not already available in the distfiles directory.
